docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Another project is in progress called Impact4c a Website application for income and expenses tracking which started in October 2021.

docs.title: About
docs.text: The Impact4c Developer Platform is updated frequently with new functionality and products to better suit your needs. We will be documenting all changes made to the platform’s products via this resource.

docs.title: October 21, 2021
docs.text: Today, we compile all the data from the client in Phase 1

docs.title: November 03, 2021
docs.text: Today, we introduced the Phybit

docs.title: November 04, 2021
docs.text: Today, we introduced the first landing page of Innsmart

docs.title: November 10, 2021
docs.text: Today, we develope the Participants profile.

docs.title: November 27, 2021
docs.text: Today, we introduced the UI design for setting.

docs.title: December 04, 2021
docs.text: Today, we develope the complete Total income UI for participants.

docs.title: December 06, 2021
docs.text: Today, we added the Programe and Project names.

docs.title: December 08, 2021
docs.text: Today, we added the graph in dashboard

docs.title: February 10, 2022
docs.text: Today, we added SSL for impact4c.my

docs.title: March 04, 2022
docs.text: Today, we made some major improvement - Redesign the hompage poster - Redesign log in UI - Add new poster on Dashboard - Add Filter negeri, Program, Project - All project change to full name project.

docs.title: April 05, 2022
docs.text: Today, we added access for the client, participants and funders.

docs.title: April 05, 2022
docs.text: Today, we added access for the client, participants and funders.

docs.title: December 12, 2022
docs.text: Today, we introduced the UI design for setting.

docs.title: December 15, 2022
docs.text: Today, we introduced the front landing page design.

docs.title: January 02, 2023
docs.text: Today, we design new UI in Phase 2

docs.title: January 11, 2023
docs.text: Today, we create 2 servers - for developer - production (final)

docs.title: January 13, 2023
docs.text: Today, we initiated Beta stage for Phase 2.

docs.title: January 31, 2023
docs.text: Today, we fix the project which has no name only numbers, create new transaction which has no graph

docs.title: February 01, 2023
docs.text: Today, we introduce the new logo of IMPACT4C

docs.title: February 04, 2023
docs.text: Today, we added the Awas sign before user deleting the program.

docs.title: February 13, 2023
docs.text: Today, we added the new logo and fix the filter.

docs.title: February 16, 2023
docs.text: Today, we identify the bug which cause the filter function not working.

docs.title: March 06, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had meeting with the client. Client briefly share their ideas on the new core architecture add expenses (graph visualize will be finalise), develope an mobile apps based on the income and expenses for users experience, static website for madu kelulut and pepper.

docs.title: March 07, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had a final amend on the Phase 2 Moving to Alpha stage

docs.title: March 10, 2023
docs.text: Today, we added the new Melaka and Labuan, and correct the typo of Selangor. The bug that cause unable to add program and project has been removed.

docs.title: March 31, 2023
docs.text: Today, we already in Alpha stage and deployed the Phase 2 into production

docs.title: April 04, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had meeting on the advance maintainence Phase 3 development.

docs.title: April 10, 2023
docs.text: Today, we started to plan the changes in future developement.

docs.title: May 19, 2023
docs.text: Today, we try remove bug which caused but the client mistaken it wrongly.

docs.title: May 27, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had started to identify the client case study

docs.title: May 31, 2023
docs.text: Today, we identify the roles to create - Super user - FunderRead - FunderWrite - ExecutorRead - ExecutorWrite - ProgramRead - ProgramWrite - ProjectRead - ProjectWrite - Particpator

docs.title: June 04, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had started the multi-user development.

docs.title: June 07, 2023
docs.text: Today, we need to insert the baselin income in Add Profile setting. View baseline income in Participant profile.

docs.title: June 09, 2023
docs.text: Today, we create new database for the developement of multi-user. The migration to new system is ongoing.

docs.title: June 16, 2023
docs.text: Today, the organisation in setting is under progress.

docs.title: August 01, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had a meeting to understand the practical flow and its coding architecture.

docs.title: August 02, 2023
docs.text: Today, we identify another UI template called Tabler a Premium dashboard template with responsive setting.

docs.title: August 20, 2023
docs.text: Today, we had a meeting with the client to brief about the multiuser flow. Super admin is requested to add limited participants features.

docs.title: August 21, 2023
docs.text: Today, we finalizing the organisation under setting.

docs.title: August 28, 2023
docs.text: Today, we are trying to create an email for impac4c to be sent from the server (example reset password)

docs.title: August 29, 2023
docs.text: Today, we added the DKIM, DKIM2 and the function of connect email domains which assist the user to receive notification

docs.title: August 30, 2023
docs.text: Today, we finalised the use case of USER under setting
